name: Xtreme Stunt Racer Maniac Airborne Experience
name_original: Xtreme Stunt Racer Maniac Airborne Experience
description:
Ever wanted to try to do some stunts on your vehicle? well here is your chance to do some extreme stunts in xtreme stunt racer maniac.

The game offers the player with 3 different vehicle to drive which are an old sedan, an old bus and a dune buggy. The vehicles can be purchased through the in game store by using the coins which you will earn through completing the game.

The game offers 9 levels where each levels presents different challenge. In all level you have to reach the finish line while trying not to drop from the pathway made buy the shipping containers. You might find checkpoints on the way which might come in handy on the long levels where you might find yourself in a situation where you have crossed more than half of the pathway and you make a mistake and drop yourself. You can start again from the checkpoint.

The gameplay is pretty straight forward. you have race pedal and brake pedal and arrows keys which can be used to steer the vehicle.

The main objective is to enjoy as much as you can while pullings airborne stunts and reaching the finish line. So start your engines and lets ride.
